languages.text: Похоже, что в недавнем прошлом крупное судно сбросило с орбиты колоссальный объем мусора, отработанных материалов и неисправных компонентов. Той части сброса, что не сгорела в атмосфере, хватило, чтобы закупорить русло полноводной реки. Теперь течение преграждает огромная мусорная дамба, а запертая река затопляет свою долину. На склонах долины скопились стада копытных грызунов, изгнанных с привычных мест обитания и обреченных на гибель.

traits.locale_text: Похоже, что в недавнем прошлом крупное судно сбросило с орбиты колоссальный объем мусора, отработанных материалов и неисправных компонент. Той части сброса, что не сгорела в атмосфере, хватило, чтобы закупорить русло полноводной реки. Теперь течение преграждает огромная мусорная дамба, а запертая река затопляет свою долину. На склонах долины скопились стада копытных грызунов, изгнанных с привычных мест обитания и обреченных на гибель.

languages.text: It appears that a large voidship recently dumped a huge load of junk and faulty parts from orbit. The debris that did not burn up in the atmosphere is now blocking the flow of a mighty river. This "dam" is causing the river to overflow, flooding the nearby valley. A herd of large hoofed rodents has gathered along the riverbanks. If the animals lose their usual habitat, they are doomed.
languages.original_text: Похоже, что в недавнем прошлом крупное судно сбросило с орбиты колоссальный объем мусора, отработанных материалов и неисправных компонентов. Той части сброса, что не сгорела в атмосфере, хватило, чтобы закупорить русло полноводной реки. Теперь течение преграждает огромная мусорная дамба, а запертая река затопляет свою долину. На склонах долины скопились стада копытных грызунов, изгнанных с привычных мест обитания и обреченных на гибель.

traits.locale_text: A large voidship has recently dumped a huge load of detritus, junk and faulty parts from the orbit. It was too big to burn in the atmosphere and now a huge chunk of debris is blocking the flow of a mighty river. This "dam" is causing the river to overflow, flooding the nearby valley. A herd of large hoofed rodents has gathered along the riverbanks. Without their usual habitat the animals are doomed.

A large voidship has recently dumped a huge load of detritus, junk and faulty parts from the orbit. It was too big to burn in the atmosphere and now a huge chunk of debris is blocking the flow of a mighty river. This "dam" is causing the river to overflow, flooding the nearby valley. A herd of large hoofed rodents has gathered along the riverbanks. Without their usual habitat the animals are doomed.

A large voidship has recently dumped a huge load of junk and faulty parts from orbit. That debris, which didn't burn up in the atmosphere, is now blocking the flow of a mighty river. This "dam" is causing the river to overflow, flooding the nearby valley. A herd of large hoofed rodents has gathered along the riverbanks. Without their usual habitat the animals are doomed.

This "dam" is causing the river to overflow, flooding the nearby valley. A herd of large hoofed rodents has gathered along the riverbanks. If the animals lose their usual habitat, they are doomed.

This "dam" is causing the river to overflow, flooding the nearby valley. A herd of large hoofed rodents has gathered along the riverbanks. If the animals lose their usual habitat, they are doomed.

It appears that a large voidship recently dumped a huge load of junk and faulty parts from orbit. The debris that did not burn up in the atmosphere is now blocking the flow of a mighty river. This "dam" is causing the river to overflow, flooding the nearby valley. A herd of large hoofed rodents has gathered along the riverbanks. If the animals lose their usual habitat, they are doomed.

languages.text: 最近，似乎有一艘大型虚空舰在轨道上倾泻了大量垃圾与废品零件。这些碎片并没有在大气层中燃烧殆尽，而是落在了行星表面，堆在某条主要河流的河道上。这座“堤坝”目前导致洪水泛滥，附近的山谷都被洪水淹没。一群体型硕大的有蹄类动物已经聚集在了河岸边。如果这些动物失去了它们赖以生存的栖息地，它们恐怕会面临灭顶之灾。
languages.original_text: It appears that a large voidship recently dumped a huge load of junk and faulty parts from orbit. The debris that did not burn up in the atmosphere is now blocking the flow of a mighty river. This "dam" is causing the river to overflow, flooding the nearby valley. A herd of large hoofed rodents has gathered along the riverbanks. If the animals lose their usual habitat, they are doomed.

traits.locale_text: 最近，似乎有一艘大型虚空舰在轨道上倾泻了大量垃圾与废品零件。这些碎片并没有在大气层中燃烧殆尽，而是落在了行星表面，堆在某条主要河流的河道上。这座“堤坝”目前导致洪水泛滥，附近的山谷都被洪水淹没。一群体型硕大的有蹄类动物已经聚集在了河岸边。如果这些动物失去了它们赖以生存的栖息地，它们恐怕会面临灭顶之灾。

languages.text: Parece que una nave del vacío de gran tamaño ha lanzado un cargamento de basura y piezas defectuosas desde la órbita. Los escombros que no se han consumido en la atmósfera ahora bloquean el curso de un río caudaloso. Esta «presa» hace que el río se desborde, inundando un valle cercano. Una manada de roedores grandes con pezuñas se ha reunido junto a la ribera. Si los animales pierden su hábitat, están condenados.
languages.original_text: It appears that a large voidship recently dumped a huge load of junk and faulty parts from orbit. The debris that did not burn up in the atmosphere is now blocking the flow of a mighty river. This "dam" is causing the river to overflow, flooding the nearby valley. A herd of large hoofed rodents has gathered along the riverbanks. If the animals lose their usual habitat, they are doomed.

traits.locale_text: Parece que una nave del vacío de gran tamaño ha lanzado un cargamento de basura y piezas defectuosas desde la órbita. Los escombros que no se han consumido en la atmósfera ahora bloquean el curso de un río caudaloso. Esta «presa» hace que el río se desborde, inundando un valle cercano. Una manada de roedores grandes con pezuñas se ha reunido junto a la ribera. Si los animales pierden su hábitat, están condenados.

languages.text: 大型のヴォイドシップが惑星の軌道上から最近大量のガラクタと欠陥部品を投棄したようだ。大気圏で燃え尽きなかった宇宙ゴミは、現在銀河の流れをせき止めている。この「ダム」が川を溢れさせ、近くの谷を水浸しにしている。川岸には大きな蹄のあるネズミの群れが集まっている。動物たちが通常の生息地を失えば、その運命は絶望的だ。
languages.original_text: It appears that a large voidship recently dumped a huge load of junk and faulty parts from orbit. The debris that did not burn up in the atmosphere is now blocking the flow of a mighty river. This "dam" is causing the river to overflow, flooding the nearby valley. A herd of large hoofed rodents has gathered along the riverbanks. If the animals lose their usual habitat, they are doomed.

traits.locale_text: 大型のヴォイドシップが惑星の軌道上から最近大量のガラクタと欠陥部品を投棄したようだ。大気圏で燃え尽きなかった宇宙ゴミは、現在銀河の流れをせき止めている。この「ダム」が川を溢れさせ、近くの谷を水浸しにしている。川岸には大きな蹄のあるネズミの群れが集まっている。動物たちが通常の生息地を失えば、その運命は絶望的だ。

languages.text: Offenbar hat hier kürzlich ein großes Raumschiff aus dem Orbit eine riesige Ladung Schrott und defekte Teile abgeworfen. Die Schrottteile, die nicht in der Atmosphäre verglüht sind, blockieren nun den Lauf eines mächtigen Flusses. Dieser "Damm" sorgt dafür, dass der Fluss über seine Ufer tritt und das nahegelegene Tal überschwemmt. Eine Herde großer behufter Nagetiere hat sich am Flussufer versammelt. Wenn die Tiere ihren üblichen Lebensraum verlieren, sind sie dem Untergang geweiht.
languages.original_text: It appears that a large voidship recently dumped a huge load of junk and faulty parts from orbit. The debris that did not burn up in the atmosphere is now blocking the flow of a mighty river. This "dam" is causing the river to overflow, flooding the nearby valley. A herd of large hoofed rodents has gathered along the riverbanks. If the animals lose their usual habitat, they are doomed.

traits.locale_text: Offenbar hat hier kürzlich ein großes Raumschiff aus dem Orbit eine riesige Ladung Schrott und defekte Teile abgeworfen. Die Schrottteile, die nicht in der Atmosphäre verglüht sind, blockieren nun den Lauf eines mächtigen Flusses. Dieser "Damm" sorgt dafür, dass der Fluss über seine Ufer tritt und das nahegelegene Tal überschwemmt. Eine Herde großer behufter Nagetiere hat sich am Flussufer versammelt. Wenn die Tiere ihren üblichen Lebensraum verlieren, sind sie dem Untergang geweiht.

languages.text: Il semblerait qu'un grand croiseur stellaire ait largué une quantité importante de ferraille et de pièces défectueuses depuis l'orbite. Les débris qui ne sont pas consumés dans l'atmosphère obstruent désormais le cours d'un énorme fleuve. Ce « barrage » a fait sortir le fleuve de son lit et l'eau a envahi les vallées environnantes. Une horde de grands rongeurs dotés de sabots s'est formée le long des berges. Si les animaux perdent leur habitat naturel, ils seront condamnés.
languages.original_text: It appears that a large voidship recently dumped a huge load of junk and faulty parts from orbit. The debris that did not burn up in the atmosphere is now blocking the flow of a mighty river. This "dam" is causing the river to overflow, flooding the nearby valley. A herd of large hoofed rodents has gathered along the riverbanks. If the animals lose their usual habitat, they are doomed.

traits.locale_text: Il semblerait qu'un grand croiseur stellaire ait largué une quantité importante de ferraille et de pièces défectueuses depuis l'orbite. Les débris qui ne sont pas consumés dans l'atmosphère obstruent désormais le cours d'un énorme fleuve. Ce « barrage » a fait sortir le fleuve de son lit et l'eau a envahi les vallées environnantes. Une horde de grands rongeurs dotés de sabots s'est formée le long des berges. Si les animaux perdent leur habitat naturel, ils seront condamnés.

languages.text: Görünen o ki büyük bir uçsuz gemisi geçenlerde yörüngeden büyük bir miktarda çöp ve arızalı parça dökmüş. Atmosferde yanıp yok olmayan enkaz yığını artık güçlü bir nehrin akışını engelliyor. Bu "baraj", nehrin taşıp yakınlardaki bir vadinin su basmasına sebep olmuş. İri toynaklı kemirgenlerden oluşan bir sürü, nehrin kıyısında toplanmış. Bu hayvanlar olağan yaşam alanlarını kaybederlerse ölmeleri kesin.
languages.original_text: It appears that a large voidship recently dumped a huge load of junk and faulty parts from orbit. The debris that did not burn up in the atmosphere is now blocking the flow of a mighty river. This "dam" is causing the river to overflow, flooding the nearby valley. A herd of large hoofed rodents has gathered along the riverbanks. If the animals lose their usual habitat, they are doomed.
